description: Save any URL to the Internet Archive and retrieve archived snapshots on demand. Search captures by date and get capture counts and history for any site. Preserve and audit web content without managing API keys.

capabilities.name: save_url
capabilities.description: Save a URL to the Wayback Machine

capabilities.name: get_archived_url
capabilities.description: Retrieve an archived version of a URL

capabilities.name: search_archives
capabilities.description: Search the Wayback Machine archives for a URL

capabilities.name: check_archive_status
capabilities.description: Check if a URL has been archived
